group.name: Plugin Commands: OTA Server
group.description: The OTA Server plugin provides Over-the-air commands for upgrading firmware and downloading specific files on the server side.

command.description: Sends an OTA Image Notify message to the specified destination indicating a new version of an image is available for download.

arg.name: destination
arg.description: The node ID (can be a broadcast address) to which this OTA Notify message should be sent

arg.name: endpoint
arg.description: Target endpoint for the OTA Notify message (only really meaningful for non-broadcast target destination).

arg.name: payloadType
arg.description: Used to specify which parameters you want included in the OTA Notify cluster command payload (0 = jitter value only; 1 = jitter and manufacturer id; 2 = jitter, mfr id, and device id; 3 = jitter, mfr id, device id, and firmware version)

arg.name: jitter
arg.description: Corresponds to QueryJitter parameter in the OTA Upgrade cluster specification. The parameter indicates whether the client receiving Image Notify Command should send in Query Next Image Request command or not.

arg.name: manuf-id
arg.description: Manufacturer ID for the image being advertised (should match the mfr ID in the OTA file's header)

arg.name: imageTypeId
arg.description: Image type ID for the image being advertised (should match the image type ID from the OTA file's header)

arg.name: version
arg.description: Firmware version of the image being advertised (should match the version from the OTA file's header)

command.description: Instruct a device to upgrade now.

arg.name: mfrId
arg.description: Manufacturer ID for the image (0xFFFF for wildcard)

arg.name: imageType
arg.description: Image type for the image (0xFFFF for wildcard)

arg.name: fileVersion
arg.description: File version for the image (0xFFFFFFFF for wildcard)

command.description: Prints the polices used by the OTA Server Policy Plugin
Sets the policy used by the OTA Server Policy Plugin when it receives a query request from the client.

arg.name: policyValue
arg.description: 0: Upgrade if server has newer (default), 1: Downgrade if server has older, 2: Reinstall if server has same, 3: No next version (no next image is available for download)

command.description: Sets the policy used by the OTA Server Policy Plugin when it receives an upgrade end request

arg.name: policyValue
arg.description: 0: Upgrade Now (default), 1: Upgrade in 2 minutes, 2: Ask me later to upgrade, 3: Abort Upgrade (send default response)

arg.name: policyValue
arg.description: 0: Upgrade if server has newer (default), 1: Downgrade if server has older, 2: Reinstall if server has same, 3: No next version (no next image is available for download)

arg.name: policyValue
arg.description: 0: Upgrade if server has newer (default), 1: Downgrade if server has older, 2: Reinstall if server has same, 3: No next version (no next image is available for download)

command.description: Sets the policy used by the ota-server Policy Plugin when it receives an image block request.

arg.name: policyValue
arg.description: 0: Send block (default), 1: Delay download once for 2 minutes, 2: Always abort download after first block

arg.name: period
arg.description: The minimum block period in milliseconds.
